name: snakemake

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Snakemake is an MIT-licensed workflow management system.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wrapt
dependencies.description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-throttler
dependencies.description: Zero dependency Python package for easy throttling with asyncio support.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-configargparse
dependencies.description:
Applications with more than a handful of user-settable options are best
configured through a combination of command line args, config files,
hard-coded defaults, and in some cases, environment variables. Python's
command line parsing modules such as argparse have very limited support
for config files and environment variables, so this module extends
argparse to add these features.

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".

dependencies.name: py-datrie
dependencies.description:
Super-fast, efficiently stored Trie for Python (2.x and 3.x). Uses
libdatrie.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-gitpython
dependencies.description: GitPython is a python library used to interact with Git repositories.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-nbformat
dependencies.description: The Jupyter Notebook format

dependencies.name: py-toposort
dependencies.description: Implements a topological sort algorithm.

dependencies.name: py-connectionpool
dependencies.description: Thread-safe connection pool for python.

dependencies.name: py-pulp
dependencies.description:
PuLP is an LP modeler written in Python. PuLP can generate MPS or LP
files and call GLPK, COIN-OR CLP/CBC, CPLEX, GUROBI, MOSEK, XPRESS,
CHOCO, MIPCL, SCIP to solve linear problems.

dependencies.name: py-smart-open
dependencies.description:
smart_open is a Python 2 & Python 3 library for efficient streaming of
very large files from/to S3, HDFS, WebHDFS, HTTP, or local storage. It
supports transparent, on-the-fly (de-)compression for a variety of
different formats.

dependencies.name: py-filelock
dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependencies.name: py-stopit
dependencies.description:
Raise asynchronous exceptions in other threads, control the timeout of
blocks or callables with two context managers and two decorators.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-ratelimiter
dependencies.description: Simple Python module providing rate limiting.

dependencies.name: py-yte
dependencies.description: A YAML template engine with Python expressions.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-reretry
dependencies.description: Easy to use retry decorator.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pygraphviz
dependencies.description: Python interface to Graphviz

dependencies.name: py-oauth2client
dependencies.description:
OAuth 2.0 client library. Note: oauth2client is now deprecated. No more
features will be added to the libraries and the core team is turning
down support. We recommend you use google-auth and oauthlib.

dependencies.name: py-google-crc32c
dependencies.description:
This package wraps the google/crc32c hardware-based implementation of
the CRC32C hashing algorithm.

dependencies.name: py-google-api-python-client
dependencies.description:
The Google API Client for Python is a client library for accessing the
Plus, Moderator, and many other Google APIs.

dependencies.name: py-google-cloud-storage
dependencies.description: Google Cloud Storage API client library.

dependencies.name: py-ftputil
dependencies.description: High-level FTP client for Python.

dependencies.name: py-boto3
dependencies.description: The AWS SDK for Python.

dependencies.name: py-botocore
dependencies.description: Low-level, data-driven core of boto 3.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.
